mapper.select: select id, section, practice_type, course_enrollment_id from enrollments_courseenrollment_practice where status = 'ACTIVE' and course_enrollment_id = #{course_enrollment_id} order by section, practice_type
mapper.insert: insert into enrollments_courseenrollment_practice( created, modified, status, section, practice_type, course_enrollment_id ) values ( now(), now(), #{status}, #{section}, #{practice_type}, #{course_enrollment_id} )
